item.title: Spring + Quartz + JavaMail Integration Tutorial
item.description: Quartz is a job scheduling framework which is used to schedule the jobs to be executed on the specified time schedule. JavaMail is an API to send/recieve emails from Java Applications. Spring has integration points to integrate Quartz and JavaMail which makes easy to use those APIs. Lets create a small demo application to show how to integrate Spring + Quartz + JavaMail. Our application is to send birthday wishes emails to friends everyday at 6 AM.
